title: "Argh blargh u guys said champion 'x' was balanced last yesterday now tomorrow they OP??! Ugh argh"
body:
Correction:

A large group of mains who constantly circlejerk over their class said that champion was balanced. 

I'll stop beating around the bush. Mage mains said ori was balanced, most sane people have realized she's been busted for the last few months. And mage mains say this because mage mains think their 1000k+ ranged throw a skill shot out with no repercussions whether hit or miss "feel the fairest" over other classes. 

So in short, no, "we" did not say Ori was balanced. "They" said ori was balanced. We =/= They.

replies.body:
The part that gets me is how this happens over night. Ori is OP when she Wasn't yesterday? We're in mid patch. If Ori's OP, she would have been OP since the patch began. (A week ago) 

Did some meta sheep see her in Pro play or something?

Nah, Ori threads have been around for a long, long time.
It's just recent that they started getting more upvotes than downvotes.
Basically this.
Ori has been OP for some months now.

Maybe mage mains still feel the same? Ori's by far not OP. Strong yes.

But if a midlaner says she's not OP then I'd take that word, because that guy/gal has to lane against her.

Dodging is a thing you know.

Im a mid laner and I say shes op. 
Now you have to take my word hehe xd
Well I'm a midlaner as well, and i know how to dodge skills. She's not OP.

The biggest difficulty I have with Orianna is knowing her ranges. There's a point where the ball just sits there, and there's a point where she can move it and really deal some damage, but I don't play against her often enough to have a good feel for what those ranges are.

Does that mean she's OP? No, of course not, I just need to play against her more.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/iEJNFcTw-k-then-ill-report-this-as-a-bug Sure, if her Q and W were anywhere near dodgable in lane xd
Useless post of yours there, that thread is 4 months old.
And they fixed it since the 4 months? Its not possible to dodge her Q regardless in lane when she can place it inside your minions lol.

Yes, they fixed it.
And no, it's not impossible to dodge it.

https://i.gyazo.com/c6ddd2122e95b96d1c28787078baec79.png Yeah in this situation you can easily dodge it, just stop laning and stand at your tower.

https://i.gyazo.com/b485aa74fe496055ac493b2e22198d6f.gif retarded korean challanger player cant dodge kappa

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=00010000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-26T16:46:16.917+0000)
>
> https://i.gyazo.com/c6ddd2122e95b96d1c28787078baec79.png Yeah in this situation you can easily dodge it, just stop laning and stand at your tower.
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/b485aa74fe496055ac493b2e22198d6f.gif retarded korean challanger player cant dodge kappa

the fuck are you standing right next to the ball for....

Also if she uses her QW offensively like that you have more than ample time to trade with her and back off/ shove her in.

"you" as in http://lol.esportswikis.com/wiki/Cepted

Where else are you supposed to stand lol? Mage mains are pretty funny when it comes to defending waifus https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/1904/3.0

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=0001000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-26T17:15:12.576+0000)
>
> "you" as in http://lol.esportswikis.com/wiki/Cepted
> 
> Where else are you supposed to stand lol? Mage mains are pretty funny when it comes to defending waifus https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/1904/3.0

Who is that guy lmao.

And just because i'm defending ori doesn't mean i play her. It's very difficult to be able to tell if ori's ball can move in range of you because you have to keep track of both her and the ball. It's a lot of hidden info that ori presents to a lane that should somehow be telegraphed to the opposing laner. Problem is that i have no idea how riot can present some of that hidden info without making the ori player like they can't do anything.

https://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=eew%20detpec

Same thing happened with Ahri, everyone was saying how she is "such a balanced champ with such dodgable spells :3"... and now shes getting nerfed lel.

The problem isnt info, the problem is https://i.gyazo.com/b485aa74fe496055ac493b2e22198d6f.gif what is he supposed to do? Not touch the wave at all 24/7 or lose 20% hp for free to an undodgable qw that has like 8 seconds cooldown?

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=000100000000000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-26T18:24:21.674+0000)
>
> https://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=eew%20detpec
> 
> Same thing happened with Ahri, everyone was saying how she is "such a balanced champ with such dodgable spells :3"... and now shes getting nerfed lel.
> 
> The problem isnt info, the problem is https://i.gyazo.com/b485aa74fe496055ac493b2e22198d6f.gif what is he supposed to do? Not touch the wave at all 24/7 or lose 20% hp for free to an undodgable qw that has like 8 seconds cooldown?

1. info is the problem because if he knew that she could QW him he could adjust accordingly by moving away from the ball to the right and stick to that side. 

2. chunking someone using 2 abilities for 20% hp every 8s is not a problem at all lmao. You underestimate other mid champions' harass patterns.

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=00010000000000010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-26T18:36:30.554+0000)
>
> 1. He did adjust, but you cant adjust enough without losing cs.

He **barely** adjusted.

> 2. Other mid champs herass patterns are dodgable, also most other mids arent supposed to be late game scaling/teamfight/utility champs. 

{{champion:1}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:8}} 

All of them have more or less unavoidable harass in that case. That's not how it works though.
Nice you "dodged" her qw which also means youre away from your cs. nice1 and get outscaled because utility mage cant be cancer
Not really, i just know her range and stay out of it. It's that simple

>stays out of range and miss cs for free

FTFY

Don't "fix" my posts if you're wrong.

I don't miss my CS because all I do is stand on THE OTHER SIDE of the wave.
"Other side" where? Left right? You know ori q can move right? Or are you under your turret and missing csing for free

> [{quoted}](name=ybuR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=00010000000000020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-27T07:35:55.729+0000)
>
> "Other side" where? Left right? 

The ball is on the lower midside? I position myself on the upper one.
The ball is on the upper midside? I position myself on the lower one.
Move in and out of her range to CS. She has to use the QW on minions to CS as well, so where's the problem? I know, the problem lies in people that give her poke **and** CS at the same time because they stand in the middle of the wave.


> Or are you under your turret and missing csing for free

Don't worry, I can CS nearly perfectly under tower. At least it's on the same level as my csing in the middle of the lane. It's not even that hard.

On top of that: For free? She's overextended and free to gank. That's not free, that's her pushing herself into an idiotic spot to be in.
lol so you play under your turret nice job. glad to know that youre fine with losing a lane for free because of getting outbalanced

> [{quoted}](name=ybuR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=0001000000000002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-27T17:09:25.471+0000)
>
> lol so you play under your turret nice job. glad to know that youre fine with losing a lane for free because of getting outbalanced

"losing a lane for free" sorry but it's only free if you have zero idea how to deal with her and have a godawful jungler that is unable to take advantage that she is overextended
Oh look someone that doesnt play orianna

> [{quoted}](name=ybuR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=000100000000000200000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-05-27T17:53:16.637+0000)
>
> Oh look someone that doesnt play orianna

i don't need to play orianna to know how to deal with her. You seem very salty because you have zero idea how to deal with her nor how to deal with enemies that are overextended

> [{quoted}](name=ybuR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=00010000000000020000000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-27T18:49:48.378+0000)
>
> Lmao you dont even know how a champ work and you talk about it. Do you even know easy is it to push a lane and harass at the same time? You know theres a thing call wards and tracking enemy jungler right? You know having pushing lane are important right? Lmao nice theory crafting LUL

i know how she works, i play her casually and i deal with her a decent amount. You don't need to play a champion 24/7 to know how they work, specially when they haven't received any significant changes in a long time.  You can keep spewing all you want. There is a difference between overextending and pushing lane. If you cannot comprehend that or know the difference between both you are once again nothing more than a salty player who has ZERO idea how to deal with her and ZERO idea how to set up ganks. Sorry but nice "comeback" LUL

Lmao you dont even know how a champ work and you talk about it. Do you even know easy is it to push a lane and harass at the same time? You know theres a thing call wards and tracking enemy jungler right? You know having pushing lane are important right? Lmao nice theory crafting LUL
Thank you, couldn't have said it better.

i still don't understand what's overpowered with ori? i wanted to argue about ori doing the same thing mages do but if you're going to tell me that the entire mage class is broken, by all mean keep going.

Yes i'm an ori main, no Ori does not throw a 1000k range spell, her Q has 800 range it deals as much damage as a lux viktor or insert any mage here, and what's more her Q doesn't reach the spot instantly unless she's in melee range

I would agree with you that her ult cd at rank 3 is hilarious compared to other mages, and that her shielding duration is also too much (4 sec with 9 sec cd) but you just circlejerk and then call the entire mage class broken

you do not make any honor to yourself

> you do not make any honor to yourself

doth thee wisheth to duel
Juan v Juan me

Remember when mage mana costs used to actually matter? Mages really had to choose when to use their abilities back th- oh wait that's NEVER been the case. There is SO much mana/ mana regen in items that the one thing that should be gating mages DOESN'T.
Mana is a joke at this point for everyone.    No one is gated by it, honestly making everyone resourceless wouldn't feel any different than the game now.

{{champion:420}} and a good amount of tanks barring the triple Doran's ring setup are gated by mana quite a bit, some of them even after getting a mana item 

i would say {{champion:101}} {{champion:99}} are too given that they have normal spells that cost more than 100 mana per cast

Well I mean overall the boards is a vocal minority. 

Average boards thread would get 60 - 80 up votes. 100+ if good context

Average Reddit thread 2k - 3k. Up to 5k - 6k sometimes depending on content.

> [{quoted}](name=zFrostistic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-26T14:45:34.327+0000)
>
> Well I mean overall the boards is a vocal minority. 
> 
> Average boards thread would get 60 - 80 up votes. 100+ if good context
> 
> Average Reddit thread 2k - 3k. Up to 5k - 6k sometimes depending on content.

Upvotes does not mean good thread

You're using the context of "We" and "They" as one as if the community is large enough that people will think as one group. 

When you have a small group of people making threads daily, it's only fair that people will come around that disagree with them. 

When a community gets larger the odds of finding more people whom think like you or have the same ideas are greater.

So you're concept of "We" and "They" doesn't really make sense.
id just like to say I was a 4/0 xerath winning in cs hard and a 0/4 ori with bad cs one shot me when I had 3/4 hp

You were playing Xerath and were in her range post lost chapter?  That's your problem man xD

Also I'd be willing to bet there were at least 2 Qs, 1-2 autos, and/or ignite in that 75%->0 (not one-shot).
she flashed on top of me q r w and I was dead in the next auto
Being 4/0 doesn't make you invincible...especially if you don't even build defense.

> You were playing Xerath and were in her range post lost chapter? That's your problem man xD

So are squishies not allowed in her range post lost chapter? I get Xerath is suppose to be long range but not all squishes have such a luxury.

Other squishies have their own tools to deal with her.  Oftentimes it is in the form of more reliable cc, some defensive advantage (shield or damage reduction), or their own kill threat at close range (or some combination of those).

Xerath's method of survival is to abuse his range and eventually poke her down to the point where you'd win even in close range (or try to push in the waves and perhaps be more helpful in the mid/late game).

They or you can say whatever they or you want and get tons of upvotes or downvotes, but without proper reasoning I just don't care. The circlejerk (also commonly known as echo chamber effect) is everywhere, no matter which side you take.

Now if you wanted to say that Orianna is OP would you care to elaborate your view or did you want to create yet another circlejerk?

> [{quoted}](name=Cancer Cavalier ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cT49gEyI,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-05-26T15:14:43.631+0000)
>
> They or you can say whatever they or you want and get tons of upvotes or downvotes, but without proper reasoning I just don't care. The circlejerk (also commonly known as echo chamber effect) is everywhere, no matter which side you take.

Not inaccurate however I almost always try to speak from a point of view that attempts to eliminate bias. I realize there's always some bias, but I'm far more open-minded than most. I can't allow the reverse truth of my current complaint to discourage me from making my point because it doesn't make it any less true. 

> Now if you wanted to say that Orianna is OP would you care to elaborate your view or did you want to create yet another circlejerk?

I've already made another thread about ori that's had plenty of activity. Why do I need to make another one?

> Why do I need to make another one?

...funny
